LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.HomePageProductIds.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the products, which will be shown on the home page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.MainBannerImageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select an image that will shows up in the top of your facebook store.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.ShowMainBannerOnAllPages
LocaleResource.Value: Show Main Banner On All Pages

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.ShowMainBannerOnAllPages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check this setting to show the main banner on all pages. Otherwise it will be shown only on the home page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.MainMenuCategoriesIds.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the categories, which will be shown in the menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.NumberOfMainMenuCategoryItems
LocaleResource.Value: Number Of Top Level Menu Category Items

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.NumberOfMainMenuCategoryItems.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number of categories to be shown as top level items in the menu. The rest will be shown in "More" menu item.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.IncludeManufacturersItemInMainMenu
LocaleResource.Value: Include Manufacturers Item In The Main Menu

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.IncludeManufacturersItemInMainMenu.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check this setting to show a manufacturers item in the main menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.CategoryPageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set how many products to be shown on category page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.NumberOfItemBoxesPerRow
LocaleResource.Value: Number Of Item Boxes Per Row

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.NumberOfItemBoxesPerRow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set how many products to be shown on each row in product grid.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.NumberOfRelatedProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set how many related products to be shown on product page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.ShowShortDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show short description on product details page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.Settings.ShowFullDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show full description on product details page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.FacebookShop.Admin.ProductsPopup.ProductType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Search by Product Type (simple or grouped)
